website_summaries.verdict: The Toshiba CB35-A3120 Chromebook can act as the primary computer of a home user or student, particularly if you have near-constant access to Wi-Fi. Close to the top choice, the 13-inch CB35-A3120 Chromebook comes highly recommended.
pros: Good boot times and battery life from Haswell-based processor

customer_reviews.title: I divorced Win OS's and took a gamble. BOY DID I MAKE A .................
customer_reviews.text: GREAT CHOICE. I have never had hands-on a Chromebook prior to this purchase. I read some reviews. and took the leap. I love this laptop. It's the type of OS I always dreamed about. Everything about it suits my needs perfectly I have a lifestyle that I do not need to worry about WIFI access.(by the way if I do not have WIFI access I'm sure will survive.) The "cloud " concept is new to me and it's great. I can create offline docs and move them to any number of external storage devices. The laptop is supper light weight and the machine is very slim and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: As someone who uses the internet on a daily basis, this low-priced computer alternative has served me very well thus far. Yes, you can't download any Windows-based programs, but Google has really done well on creating an affordable laptop that will keep you connected. Hopefully as the Chromebook community grows, we'll see even more improvements in the Store and programs available to the platform. I think I'll be able to get a lot of use out of it and it's better than the no laptop I had prior to. Great video playback, decent speakers, huge screen.. I'm pretty impressed!
customer_reviews.author: DeMei

customer_reviews.title: Chromebook Meets Criteria
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Chromebook I've purchased. Two for my daughter (the first one had a little mishap) and one for my boyfriend. Let's just say that it's the ideal laptop for the college student. It will do everything the need for college and most classes utilize Google Chrome's platform for papers and such. As for the boyfriend, he needed a simple laptop that would allow him to do the "basics" that everyone usually needs to...email, surf the net, watch movies, etc. Why spend more when you can get everything you need in this?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about taking the plunge and buying a chromebook, but I'm glad that I finally did because it's an extremely affordable laptop that meets all of my needs. If you are already heavily invested into Google's ecosystem, as I am, then you will be happy that you bought a Chromebook, as all of Google services work seamlessly with it. Also, the 13.3 inch screen is a great size for me since I've always felt that the 11.6 inch screen is too small. I can count the number of times I used my desktop PC now that I've purchased this chromebook. And, for less than the price of my most mid to upper-priced smart phones, it's a solid deal.
customer_reviews.author: Muata

customer_reviews.title: This is a fabulous Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: The screen is the best I've seen. The detail is incredible. I punched in my SD card from my camera and was amazed at the clarity of the pictures. If you don't know a Chromebook read on it. It's not a laptop, no DVD, you can't just plug in any device and save much to it. It's more similar to an IPad and Apps, just not as many. If you just surf the web and do e-mail, and bill paying and such- wonderful- and this Chromebook is fast fast. ON instantly, 3 times faster maybe more than my laptop or Ipad in pulling up web pages or anything. I'm certainly not disappointed, and feel its top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Orion

customer_reviews.title: Nice little laptop
customer_reviews.text: I know there is a way to turn it on and off but I still find that it is really strange that there's no Caps lock button. Otherwise, this is a nice little laptop. It's very fast, has an above average screen clarity that's great for watching movies, and was super easy to set up. It's very light and slim. Perfect for a teenager or college student to tote back and forth to class. I bought it for my 17 year old daughter and she loves it despite the fact that it can't always do what a Windows machine can do.
customer_reviews.author: Winnow Bevy

customer_reviews.title: It's a Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: It's not a laptop and that is ok. I like that it starts up fast, big screen and lightweight. It has no HD display and at times during a movie the quality is just not good. Dark scenes especialy. Again, that is to be expected. I bought it after my nexus7 died on me, just outside the warrenty timeframe. Having a maschine like that, with good wifi and the keyboard makes me only miss mynexus7 while watching movies, but i found my solution for that as well. Google chromecast.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I'd never seen a Chromebook laptop in action before. However, after much research, I purchased my Toshiba Chromebook. All I can say is AWESOME!!!!!! I do a lot of web surfing, email and Google Docs. In addition, I use Facebook, Netflix and Amazon Prime movie watching as well. This laptop works perfectly for all of those applications. And, it boots in less than ten seconds!! Seriously, it's easier to open up my laptop, loging (if necessary) and do a Google search than it is to do the same thing on my phone. I am EXTREMELY happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MAINEiac

customer_reviews.title: I have been happy with the c
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chromebook when my laptop up & died. Price was the main reason I bought a chromebook, could not afford to buy another laptop. I have been happy with the c. book. It is very fast & does not require a security program. I'm not tech savy, therefore can not offer too much info. This Toshiba c. book has a quality appearance, a good feel to the keyboard, & nice sharp images with true to life colors. The texture on the outside top & bottom of the case is great because it gives me a secure grip, haven't dropped it once (dropped my old laptop many times).
customer_reviews.author: Lainybugaroo

customer_reviews.title: A good CHROMEBOOK... but DO NOT CONFUSE IT FOR A TRADITIONAL LAPTOP.
customer_reviews.text: REMEMBER: This is a CHROMEBOOK... NOT a computer or laptop in the traditional sense. I can't tell you how many people approached me after I bought this "$200 computer" for the food bank. The only reason I went with this option is because the non-profit organization needed a computer solely for the purpose of accessing a website database. So this was a very cost effective option that everyone could understand. For what it is, it works very well. I had it out of the box, configured, setup and connected in about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: AvidConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this purchase. Been using it for school, email, and web browsing for a year or so and haven't had a single problem (coming from using PCs that's huge for me!). Great battery life, decent resolution for me and plenty fast enough for what I use it for. When I first ordered the chrome book I didn't realize that its not a regular laptop, but I did read up on it before it came. I will buy one again.
customer_reviews.author: Brett M.

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best current laptop in it's price range
customer_reviews.text: Ive used every chromebook on the market except the new Dell chromebook 11. And this is the best one I used in this price range. Which means every chromebook except the chromebook pixel that is over $1200. Some say the Dell chromebook 11 is the new best chromebook in this price range. But like I said I haven't used the dell. But the dell also is 11" while this is 13.3" So if you want the larger screen I would get this toshiba. If you want something smaller I would look at the Dell or the acer c720.
customer_reviews.author: J. Limandri

customer_reviews.title: The screen is better than some would have you believe
customer_reviews.text: Yes it's all plastic and cheap feeling, but it's smoking fast. The screen is better than some would have you believe. Sometimes you can hear the fan but it's not loud or a distraction. To me the keyboard is just fine, but if you are looking for a high-end feel then get a real keyboard and plug it into the usb port. A smaller Chromebook, such an Acer 720, is more convenient for road-warriors and couch surfers, but the bigger screen is nice for older (tired) eyes. Occasionally I hook it up to a 22 inch LCD TV (as a monitor) and it drives it just fine. Battery life is very good, but video shortens the battery life significantly.
customer_reviews.author: HD014

customer_reviews.title: Impressive speed and battery life
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my parents but now considering getting one for myself. Incredibly fast, boot up time in seconds, would take more than a minute on my Thinkpad which cost 6 times more. Also the browsing speed, scrolling webpages are super fast. Not sure about the battery life, the number is changing between 5:30 and 9:00 hours. Safe to say it will likely last more than 5 hours. Highly recommended, it's an absolute steal for this price.
customer_reviews.author: George Nevis

customer_reviews.title: One Of The Best Chromebooks Available
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is over all very speedy thanks to the Intel Haswell processor. The keyboard and the trackpad are not that great, but decent for a laptop of the price. I think you will probably be satisfied with this laptop as long as you are not expecting very high-powered performance. It comes down to whether or not the Chrome OS will be suitable for your needs, if that is the case, I would definitely recommend this to you. If Chrome OS is not suitable to your needs, it can still be a great secondary machine.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR HARD EARNED MONEY! IT'S PURE JUNK.
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL! The Chromebook is so flimsy that when it's open, the screen section is too heavy and the thing tips over! It's junk! I ordered one that was supposed to be "refurbished" but don't waste your money! It was impossible to even get working and to STAY working for more than 5 minutes at a time! I went over the time limit to return due to illness which didn't matter to the seller. So I wasted $140!!! WASTE of MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: dakco

customer_reviews.title: this is definitely the best one. While it can't handle 40 tabs at ...
customer_reviews.text: Out of all of the Chromebooks, this is definitely the best one. While it can't handle 40 tabs at once, or heavy duty Netflix streaming, it's wonderful to use while doing things like surfing the web, using multiple Google apps at once, or writing papers. It's aesthetically pleasing, and it doesn't scuff or scratch. The screen is a little polarized, but you're definitely getting your moneys worth and more.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Brown

customer_reviews.title: New and different, but quite workable
customer_reviews.text: I got this computer to see if it could suffice as a laptop, but also as an alternative to Windows operating systems. The chrome OS works fine for me - it's 'invisible' I would say. As for the hardware, it has sacrificed a few keys I learned to expect.- the first I noticed was no deleted key. Not much of a problem using a few key strokes to delete stuff. It's a little cheaper than the usual laptops which I can live with. I think I will be satisfied with it after using it for while.
customer_reviews.author: Don  Frampton

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging. Works right out of the box as ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging. Works right out of the box as advertised. Bought the Chromebook for my elderly mother who enjoys using it. Definitely recommended for fuss free basic computing such as web browsing, listening to podcasts, email and viewing of email attachments. My mother also enjoys reading ebooks online and is now able to access large amount of books without having to carry around a large bag. Long battery life also helps with minimal need to recharge i.e. at the end of each day before she goes to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Totally replaced my 7 inch tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Totally replaced my 7 inch tablet. If you can't decide what to buy for just cruising the web and reading your email...this is it. Only irritating feature is the inability to connect to other computers on my personal LAN. Connects to wifi almost as fast as you can open it. Well made and light. Battery might last 3 days of open and shut use. Never used it for hours at a time, but I would guess the battery life is somewhere around 10 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: vinsoncg

customer_reviews.title: it is cool but I had to buy a book
customer_reviews.text: The Chromebook comes with no instructions to help you understand how to use it. I still don't understand how to use download my iTunes library into Google music. Also, there are lots of things you should know about its limitations. I like that I can just jump on and check my gmail and FB page immediately. The track pad has bit of a cheap feel to it. I have to really be aware of how I am using it. It works great with the Chrome Cast connected to my t.v.
customer_reviews.author: bebe calvy

customer_reviews.title: but works great! re the product
customer_reviews.text: seller was prompt, this is a used computer, but works great! re the product: chromebook has definite limitations, I continue to have trouble with looking at photos on my memory stick (has trouble recognizing them), but for the price it's a great computer, great for any web based activity. Toshiba feels much more solid than my samsung chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: wildlyblue

customer_reviews.title: Swift in Performance, Faster than a bunny !
customer_reviews.text: The Toshiba Chromebook has got to be one of the fasted net connect machines out there. The picture is vivid and crisp and the sound quality is average. The only real drawbacks are the touchpad (kinda cheezy) and the inability to print to a standard non-cloud printer with out a second machine acting as a "server". Otherwise this machine lives up to the hype...one of the very few that do !
customer_reviews.author: AmazonReviewGuy

customer_reviews.title: value for money
customer_reviews.text: This laptop will meet the needs of most users who do some web browsing, watch videos on youtube or netflix, email, facebook etc. Even spreadsheets can be done online these days so there really is no major thing that a casual user will miss. Speed is super fast, screen is quite good, keyboard is decent, touchpad could have been better, battery life is quite good. Sd card slot enables u to add more storage space. Pics on sd card automatically upload to picasa. Charger cord is quite long which is a plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: G. Jain

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love my Chromebook so far, as a college student It is a wonderful thing to have because its battery lasts for more than long enough for me to get through the day and then some. the keyboard has a nice feel as well as the touchpad gestures being so helpful. I would however caution new purchasers that this is not something i would recommend as getting instead of a standard pc, but if you already have one this is great because chrome remote desktop allows me to remote into my other pc to do anything i couldn't do on the chromebook
customer_reviews.author: James S

customer_reviews.title: Solid. I like my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Fast. Takes a few moments for the leaning curve - it's different than the usual laptop. But figure that out and the possibilities are endless. And light - that is probably the most shocking thing. Other reviews talk about sound, and yes, it's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Best screensize and speaker for the money
customer_reviews.text: Old HP laptop was down with viruses. Needed something I could afford, quick. Read reviews. Best screensize and speaker for the money. Amazon sent this to the rescue. Love the quickness and the simplicity. Keyboard is great. Learned how to use cloud printer. Conquered touch pad. Used to call Google a bully. Now they're almost a hero.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Stone

customer_reviews.title: why did I wait so long
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to set up!! Being a mature older adult I was so used to the big old computer but when my son suggested this for a laptop I was blown away by how easy it was to set up and to use. I love this and would definitely recommend it to others. It is lightweight and you can use it anywhere in your home as long as you have wireless.
customer_reviews.author: V. Cournoyer

customer_reviews.title: She seems to like it very well and uses it daily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 20 year old daughter so my review has low merit. She seems to like it very well and uses it daily. She had a little problem hooking it to printer, my son is working on that. She forwarded me an email to print forms which i could not do either, forms did not fit page. Purchased to avoid Windows and expensive Macs
customer_reviews.author: WARD

customer_reviews.title: The best laptop for the most common user.
customer_reviews.text: Way cheapper than a Macbook Air, and way faster. I know it's a diferent usage target, but let's be honest, if you need to use heavy apps like Photoshop or Premiere Pro you'll probable won't buy a Macbook Air but a Macbook Pro instead. So if you need a laptop for surf the web, edit documents and play movies and music this chromebook is the best laptop for you.
customer_reviews.author: John Milton

customer_reviews.title: 72 days and it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Purchased via Amazon. Thrilled with the Chromebook. I had the Chromebook for 72 days and now it won't even turn on. Not even daily use...and it won't turn on. Chatted with Albert from Amazon support and was given the bad news that I needed to contact Toshiba. 45 minutes on the phone with them and they cannot figure out the issue. 72 days. Seriously. I hope they can fix or remedy the issue because it was a fun little Chromebook that was able to do most of what I needed. Did I mention it was only 72 days?
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Schrameyer

customer_reviews.title: So far I am very pleased with this computer it is very easy to use ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very pleased with this computer it is very easy to use and meets all my needs and I am learning new things everyday about the chrome operating system and have found that I have been using a lot of time waiting on Microsoft when I could have been using that extra time to do more constructive things. I would suggest purchasing this laptop to anyone that wants easy quick and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: Had this computer for several months and am impressed with how fast I get onto the internet. No glitches, no viruses and none of the long aggravating updates that are associated with Windows 7 and the necessary anti-virus software. The battery life is good and it charges up fairly quickly. The display is quite sharp with vibrant colors. I hardly use my Windows 7 laptop anymore. This Toshiba is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: George Z

customer_reviews.title: Best Chromebook to date
customer_reviews.text: Best Chromebook to date. Have owned 5 other Chromebooks over past 2 years, Samsung-HP-Acer, all but first was bought used or refurbished, all worked as advertised. Bought Toshiba CB35 from Warehouse Deals for under 200 delivered. I still have Acer C720-2802 bought about 4 months ago for 150, its a quality machine. Use computer for mostly web browsing, second TV screen, email-reading books & newspapers,stock & ETF's buying through online brokers,don't use Facebook but own stock. Pro: larger 13.3 display - case finish-good sound-7 hour battery life playing YouTube videos -above average display. Con: None Would rate Toshiba in top percent of all Chromebook, if purchased below 200 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Carriker

customer_reviews.title: Good ol toshiba.
customer_reviews.text: Defenatly not new, was missing two screws and had a few buff marks, but cleaned up nicley. Works like a brand new one. Dose feel pretty cheap with the flimsy plastic, but hey, its a chrombook. Defanatly happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: jacob p.

customer_reviews.title: Better Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: This Chromebook is doing everything we want it to. It is a step up from my first Chromebook. it is faster and the bigger screen is a plus. I still am upset that Chrome mixed the apps that don't work with Chrome in with all others making it a real pain finding the ones that work on Chromebook, so that gets the 4 rating.
customer_reviews.author: wardblvd

customer_reviews.title: It is a perfect little laptop
customer_reviews.text: I got this when my desk top was in the shop and I had bills to pay. It is a perfect little laptop. Easy to pack around and use. In the car or at table at the hospital or where ever you want.
customer_reviews.author: Verna Church

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Couple
customer_reviews.text: Beyond my expectations. I purchased two, one for my husband and one for myself. We both love them. The computer geniuses in the big box stores really undermine the chromebooks in their attempt to sell the more expensive computers. Don't listen to them. The only thing my chromebookd doesn't do is play a dvd, however I can plug a portable player in and I'm all set.
customer_reviews.author: mary wheelock

customer_reviews.title: ... chromebook for several months now and it has been awesome. The screen is big
customer_reviews.text: I have had this Toshiba chromebook for several months now and it has been awesome. The screen is big, bright and awesome to use for video. The sound is very loud and excellent for videos. I had the Samsung chromebook 11" before this and it was good but not as fast as this machine - the battery life is exceptional - I charge it every couple of days with heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Bob jesperson

customer_reviews.title: Good terminal
customer_reviews.text: The screen size of this chromebook is larger than most of the other chromebooks, and it is pretty light considering this size and the price. I used this chromebook as the terminal, because I need to do programming on a server. The built-in "ssh" function and the large screen meet my requirement. I take it with me when I'm not working in the office or home. I also use it to do presentation on google docs though I have to buy an extra converter, as a result I don't need to carry my heavy laptop to the meeting room any more.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: fast & great image---does almost all I wish to do....Wish I could do Skype...Google phone is OK, not as good as Skype..and I need a pc to do film editing...Other than that everything is Aces....google word processing is every bit as good as word for me...love that everything is saved in the cloud and that I do not have to have a virus program..
customer_reviews.author: sailorman11

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is great for people looking for a Chromebook. It's got 13 inches and pretty good display. I really loved the speakers as well. If you are a person that's online 24/7 you'll love it. There are many programs that are online now a days like; word, excel, power point so it's not a problem. and the best part it the price. You're not gonna get anything like this so i suggest to go for it . Yes the hard ware feels a little cheap but it's the chrome os doesn't let you down.
customer_reviews.author: Nirav Wagley

customer_reviews.title: A good internet computer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted something light and easy for web surfing and it's good for that. It has limitations though and I need to figure some things out like how to stream my Amazon prime videos. I bought a book on this and hopefully I'll be able to work out the little issues like that. Over all it does what I want.
customer_reviews.author: bree29

customer_reviews.title: great computer really great price so easy to use i ...
customer_reviews.text: great computer really great price so easy to use i bought it for my wife who doesn't normally like a computer she loves and uses this all the time and since its a chrome book i don't have to worry about a virus
customer_reviews.author: stephen m cooke

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I need. Gotta figure out how to deal with word programs.
customer_reviews.text: This Chromebook is quick and light. My only problem is I am used to using MS Word. I may try to use online text program either word or maybe I will try to use LaTex. I have a friend who programs and does research and he loves LateX. Maybe I'll try to break myself into using LaTex over the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Nice big screen, fantastic long battery, big keyboard for my big fingers. Light enough to tote to work and back comfortably, fantastic for note-taking at important meetings. I'm almost 40 so it's taking me some time to get used to the idea of the cloud (where does everything getting "saved" go? Could it be some sort of conspiracy I don't understand?) but this is wonderfully addictive, and incredibly easy to use and transport. Feels like the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob M Kalish

customer_reviews.title: did not ask that long horrible
customer_reviews.text: it was bad crashed like my Samsung tab never again online get at Best Buy
customer_reviews.author: Salvador ERodriguez

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Toshiba Chromebook for three months now and really like it. Have had no issues, pages load very fast, videos work well, keyboard is very nice. For the price you get much compared to a conventional notebook. Excellent choice as a 2nd computer that doesn't need to run traditional software applications.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Chrome Book. The 13" is just the right size. Keyboard is great, and responsive. I had a Samsung 11" so I was already familiar with the Chrome Book. The new Google Chrome Book introduction is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Sweitzer

customer_reviews.title: My Toshiba Chromebook.
customer_reviews.text: I like the speed of connecting to the internet, being lightweight was also a plus. I wish more directions re. connecting to a printer were enclosed as I am still not sure how to procede. I purchased an Epson XP310 for this purpose. Any help would be appreciated. Liam Nolan.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Toshiba Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Had trouble getting use to the small case letters on the keyboard and had a small problem with touch pad that was fixed with a call. Tech for Less has been great in assisting and I would have no problem giving a thumbs up to the book and the supplier
customer_reviews.author: Bill Scriven

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Never bought used. Tried something new. Unit is just as fast and reliable. Would do it again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Mannings

customer_reviews.title: For comparison I don't know the offer still good for other chrome books
customer_reviews.text: Just received yesterday. Found out free 100G google drive storage offer expired for this product when trying to redeem it. Checked back in the product description and it was not removed yet. If you consider this product, please include this fact in your decision. For comparison I don't know the offer still good for other chrome books. For the product itself, 13 inch is easier on the eye than 11.6 models.
customer_reviews.author: K C

customer_reviews.title: Stay away - very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Computer stopped working after 1 year. I followed instructions and sent it Toshiba repair facility. It lasted 3 1/2 months then stopped working again. Toshiba will not repair it again. This is a ripoff!
customer_reviews.author: T. Caire

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Chromebook to replace my current laptop which was beginning to have issues with battery and which was becoming very slow. The Toshiba is lightning fast on startup and has great battery life. I can use it all day without needing to recharge. Another plus is it's light weight which I think will be great for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: it's sturdy, it does what you need it to do
customer_reviews.text: Writing this review from the Chromebook, it's sturdy, it does what you need it to do, the battery lasts forever. Love Chromebooks and likely won't go back.
customer_reviews.author: Rach570

customer_reviews.title: Make sure product is new and not a return/refurbished chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Was sent someone's return. Not completely wiped out, and missing screws on the case. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should perfectly...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all the stuff you do on the web. With Google docs, etc. you can even get some work done! Keyboard has a good feel, screen resolution is good. Settings are easy adjust, battery lasts all day!. Definitely worth the $280 price.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K NY

customer_reviews.title: I dont like the screen resolution
customer_reviews.text: I dont like the screen resolution, also could not download media from my samsung cell phone. it is light and very fast wiht internet
customer_reviews.author: Maria J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price. Works seamless with Chrome Cast.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this an year ago. It still works good. Overall it exceeds my expectations of a Chromebook. I connect it using HDMI or use Chrome Cast for viewing movies on my LED TV. I do a lot of browsing on Chromebook and find it as a good buy. I've dropped it multiple times and see no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The computer is very light and fast. It has ...
customer_reviews.text: The computer is very light and fast. It has more capabilities than I ever imagined. I just need to get more used to the features that come with this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Knight

customer_reviews.title: Powerful machine for money.
customer_reviews.text: Want a fast boot up? Want it to meet 90% of your needs at 10% of your cost? This machine is for you. The 100 mb of free online storage almost pays the cost of the laptop. Make sure you download free Microsoft office apps
customer_reviews.author: Ron Mulder

customer_reviews.title: chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Really a nice little system. My wife uses it all the time. My only complaint is lack of CD/DVD capability. There are a lot of products that are not on line and are delivered by disk. Also have read online that external disk players may not work depending on drivers.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Internet Access
customer_reviews.text: This is the device for someone who mainly accesses the internet (cloud) for their computing needs. The screen is a great size and resolution for viewing any content. The keyboard is a little "quirky" -- no Caps Lock, Home or End keys, but you quickly adapt to the work-arounds.
customer_reviews.author: ChuckD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for working online.
customer_reviews.text: We did a lot of looking and thinking when we decided on Toshiba's Chromebook. Toshiba has been a very good brand for us in the past. The chromebook does everything I need and then more. I spend a lot of time online, and this has proven to be very efficient. One complaint I have is that it came with a foldout brochure with very little information on it. We have had to figure things out for ourselves. Still a great lightweight choice for a bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Chromebook I've bought many Toshiba products and like the brand. This is no different it works great.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it's great.
customer_reviews.text: Screen is adequate at best, but other than that it's been a great performer. Seems a little better built than my last Chromebook, which was a Samsung. That thing straight up died after a year.
customer_reviews.author: David Marten

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. Works really fast with all the necessary software. The only downside is the Screen. You will not see anything near HD but for the price it is more than reasonable. I would definitely recommend this product. Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Mariano Martin Saccal

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to use. Quick. I use mostly for web-based work, save other laptop for text and graphics work. Plan to network with other computer and printer. Light in weight, travels easily.
customer_reviews.author: Susan O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a pleasant surprise! I am very impressed with the chromebook ;) It starts up fast, the screen quality is great, even the sound is good!! Excellent purchase for the price! Definitely recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Hinutet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: A perfect replacement for an old XT laptop. Google Chrome is not a problem for me. Easy to use for email and web searching. Light weight and sized right. Good battery.
customer_reviews.author: Brad C.

customer_reviews.title: I don't think I could have made a better purchase! Did a lot of research before buying ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I could have made a better purchase! Did a lot of research before buying and it was time well spent. Very happy customer here.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am so mad I did not purchase this earlier. Really easy to use and the build quality is good. This device does everything I need it to do. Very fast and the battery lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Alan Gunderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Piece of Gear
customer_reviews.text: After using a Samsung for a couple years, I purchased the Toshiba for it's larger screen and faster speed. Most of my usage is for email and the internet,so the Chromebook serves the purpose real well. Also, Chrome syncs this, my Nexus 5, Nexus 7, and Windows PC very well. Easy for me to see why Google is the place to be now days. The battery life is good, if not streaming videos, which is a universal complaint, the screen is very sharp for my old eyes and it is a good looking machine. As for downsides, it is a pound heavier than the Samsing 11 inch, but still manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Hotwaterplug

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about a year now and it performs very well. I'm please with the purchase and would recommend. It takes a little getting used to Chromebooks and they are not the best choice if you do heavy graphics work or video production but it is a very fast and dependable machine at a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kestrel

customer_reviews.title: The display looks great, the price is right and it is really ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this Chromebook for around half a year now. The display looks great, the price is right and it is really light. The keyboard is responsive. I think this is a very good Chromebook for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Chui

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent transaction. Product just as promised and shipped and received as promised!
customer_reviews.author: Gene Bowser

customer_reviews.title: For me: not so perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Update Nov/2014: a few serious problems I ran into with this Chromebook made me to decide to downgrade my rating and changed my recommendation for this product. 1. No itunes support. 2. No Skype support. 3. No printer support for older printers. If you can get around these issues, I think it is still a good deal, hardware performed flawlessly, except buzz from external speaker set, which could be from the speaker connector. However, I would not buy this Chromebook again. I will get a standard Mac or PC instead of this.
customer_reviews.author: Peter G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need to do
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need to do...email, on-line banking, a little browsing. Only 3.3 pounds, not nearly as heavy as many laptops that are so much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Eskandari

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson loves this Chrome book He is only 13 years old easy to learn offers a lot Price is right
customer_reviews.author: JOANNE BOMBARDIER

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable laptop
customer_reviews.text: When I need just a web browser platform the Toshiba Chromebook is fabulous. I normally use a Windows 8.1 platform for work but for play the Chromebook gets it done a lot of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Portable, sportable, & affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Fast boot, crisp screen, does everything I need it to do! This does not replace my laptop but for Facebook, YouTube, & web surfing it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: I really like this computer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this computer. It's my first chromebook. light, good keyboard action, and it easily rune a Linux setup alongside Chrome OS.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a computer with all of the system requirements that I needed and no problem with being slow, however, I do wish it was compatible with Skype and had Microsoft Word in traditional format. But I do understand its Google and not Windows. And there is Google Hangout, Still love my chromebook!
customer_reviews.author: a.e.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing laptop. Really fast and smooth, It starts at 5 seconds, works perfectly with and without internet connection. The HD camera is really amazing, perfect for videoconferences.
customer_reviews.author: Jose S.

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating and disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: My Toshiba Chromebook refused to start only 35 days after purchased. Calling Toshiba tech support was a nightmare. I called and had to wait 2 hrs to get through them and they were not able to help me. Had to send unit back to them for repairs. Very upset that a new unit hardly use broke down so fast and how difficult was to get support help. Frustrating and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja B

customer_reviews.title: I use this daily and enjoy the speed of internet surfing
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily and enjoy the speed of internet surfing...I just wish it had enough memory to keep my pictures close
customer_reviews.author: Nor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine; but it's so compact ,that it's difficult to keep track of.
customer_reviews.author: celtic carver

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Present for a 10 year old boy. He uses it to game online. No problems. Price was right
customer_reviews.author: Paul Strohm

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: A piece of mastery. Thin, lightweight and fast. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Howard Roper

customer_reviews.title: This is great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to upgrade from an Acer Chromebook, mainly for the larger screen. I reach for this more often than my Mac to check my mail, Facebook, Google, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Ford

customer_reviews.title: She says it is very easy to use and likes how lightweight and portable it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife when her laptop died. She loves it. She says it is very easy to use and likes how lightweight and portable it is. Would suggest to anyone considering a Chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Tomm

customer_reviews.title: Meets All Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Terrific Product. Bright screen, excellent battery duration. good keyboard, lightning fast boot-up. This system is very fast indeed.There is nothing underpowered about it. The instruction manual is nothing but a small leaflet, however; learning how to use the cloud versus local storage is not obvious and there are other functions that are significantly different from a typical Apple/PC that can be a struggle to master without the correct instructions available. Apart from this, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: chemical007

customer_reviews.title: Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Stil in the early stages of using this machine, the user is very happy with it. He says it is just what he needs.
customer_reviews.author: iPad customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight option to a full size windows based laptop
customer_reviews.text: It is a great laptop alternative...being a Google fan makes it easy to use...nice battery life...runs well. Great for listening to Pandora...surfing the net....etc. A little too much Google control in that they make it tough to download photographs without being forced to use G+ etc. All in all it is a great machine for light duty work or play!!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Great, but a little too sensitive to the touch. Love the quick start-up and built in virus protection.
customer_reviews.author: Isma

customer_reviews.title: Great chromebook
customer_reviews.text: It's everything as advertised. Excellent chromebook that has met all my expectations. I would highly recommend it to others
customer_reviews.author: Gary 61

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price!
customer_reviews.text: This chromebook is quick, very light, and updates fast! Definitely a must buy!! I would recommend this product to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: D. Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Great OS, but unit was defective.
customer_reviews.text: The operating system is as expected. The computer is defective as it will not charge. It's on the way back to the vendor. Other than the battery, I like the ease of the chromebook O S. I am upgrading to the new model. I will review it after I've used it for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis T.

customer_reviews.title: Chrome OS what a great laptop!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second chromebook, upgrade from a 11 inch model. Loves the chrome OS, no more worry with security updates! System boots up instantly from sleep, about 10 secs from a complete shutdown. Battery lasts easily into 7 hours range and can be replaced (just check online instruction, very simple). Only thing that I miss from my 11 inch before is the lighter weight, this isn't bad at around 3 lb but that is something that I know will happen for a bigger screen. Would buy again in a heartbeat. Would have gotten the newer version with IPS screen but that was too much money for now with my budget.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

product_meta.title: Toshiba CB35-A3120 13.3-Inch Chromebook
feature_bullets: Can open/edit MS Office files using free embedded QuickOffice editor or Google Docs, and can download Microsoft Office Online (an online version of Microsoft Office) for free. Cannot install standard MS Office software.
16 GB Solid-State Drive (SSD); No CD or DVD drive

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars439 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
